overview:
Jason is the Vice President of Audience Strategy and Development, focused on building internal and external data reporting and engagement analysis, as a foundation to improve the growth and reach of EQAL Media Networks. Utilizing a team of seasoned research and social media analysts, Jason evaluates potential new partners to help project traffic, revenue and valuation.Jason joined EQAL in 2009 as the company’s first Interactive Coordinator, for the “Harper’s Globe” community, and has since helped to write the book on how to manage and moderate an EQAL community.

When not researching, analyzing, administrating or moderating (or doing other ‘rating’-related things), Jason is a widely-produced playwright and theatre producer, as well as an aspiring Adventure Racer. Jason holds a Bachelor of Arts Degree in Film Studies from the UC Santa Barbara, with a minor study in American History. While in school, he began his media career by producing a widely-read campus arts magazine, interning at Movieline Magazine, and launching one of the first entertainment humor websites on the Internet.
